response.summary: Mechatronic engineer focused on the design and implementation of projects related to web solutions. I have experience on internet applications programming based on different architectures, especially service-oriented patterns. I have been part of work teams in which I supported the engineering and product planning stages, even leading the execution and implementation stages on various projects. Currently I work as a devops engineer at Edunext, an Open edx partner that works on edx-platform, which is a system that allows the creation and management of massive online open courses.
response.skills: Informatics, Python programming, Django framework, Platforms for MOOC's, PHP programming, WordPress, DevOps, Microcontrollers, PLC Programming, JavaScript, CSS, Ansible, Computer Vision, Quality Control, Control Systems Design, Client-Server interfaces, continuous integration, Servicios web de RESTful, Opensource software, Aws

profile_positions.description:
Main functions:
• Development and testing of web services using the Django framework.
• Implementation of quick deployment strategies for web applications using the Ansible package.
• Maintenance and development of new features for online education platform Open edX.
• Operations monitoring in aws (devops)
• Development of custom websites based on the content management system Wordpress.
profile_positions.title: Web Developer, devops

profile_positions.description:
• Migración de la antigua plataforma de la compañía a una nueva versión que cumple con los nuevos estándares de organización de código y pruebas de software.
• Implementación de una estrategia de despliegue mas controlada para la plataforma de la compañía.
• Desarrollo de nuevos módulos con el fin de extender la funcionalidad de la plataforma (Rest APIS, integración con procesadores de pago, entre otros).
profile_positions.title: Software engineer

profile_positions.description:
Main functions:
• Providing support service to company customers.
• Monitoring the operation of the solutions for each customer. Generating monthly reports with statistics of customers operation.
• Control, monitoring and scaling of issues and software failures reported by customers.
• Management of FilaMaker and MySQL databases.
profile_positions.title: Application Support Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Main functions:
• Performing electrical and electronic tests over the appliances manufactured in the factory according to pre-established technical standards.
• Doing reports of test results and product improvement proposals.
• Adaptation and programming of automated test benches for new products.
profile_positions.title: Quality Assurance Engineer (internship)

company.name: Controlab, materiel de laboratoire pour le BTP

profile_positions.company: Controlab, materiel de laboratoire pour le BTP
profile_positions.description:
Main functions:
• Study of the technical standards governing the tests on materials used in civil engineering.
• Development of new software for mechanic tests control using the programming tool LabVIEW version 2011. Special emphasis on the development of the software for controlling indirect tensile tests.
• Support the provision of after-sales service.
profile_positions.title: Industrial computing developer (internship)

company.name: eduNEXT
company.description:
eduNEXT is an online learning technology provider dedicated to services and solutions powered by the Open edX platform. We are driven by our customer's mission to deliver outstanding online learning experiences.
 
We are fully committed to the development and promotion of the Open edX technology, as well as making accessible to everyone state-of-the-art technologies, to provide high-quality education worldwide. 

Our team of Online learning specialists has been working exclusively in Open edX related projects since 2013, providing Software as a Service hosting solutions, consulting services, technology integration, infrastructure and other professional e-learning solutions for a wide range of online education, training and assessment initiatives around the world, 
empowering them to face the challenges of providing high quality online learning.

We have pioneered the provision of Open edX as a Service at a fraction of the cost that will imply to host and manage all the technology on-premise so that our clients can deploy fast, minimize the investment and concentrate on the production and management of high-quality online learning content, which is a big challenge in itself.

Our Open edX SaaS subscriptions qre the fastest way to get all the new features from the latest Open edX release! 

Get started immediately by launching one of our lite subscriptions that will get you the experience of running your site with us, and also a chance to use some of our features at no cost for a limited number of users. 

Contact us at sales@edunext.co or Visit our website www.edunext.co!
